p.e:
CREATING MY FIRST AVITAR:
I've noticed that a lot of people go for robots when
it comes to body designs, and I really wasn't any
diffrent in my case
I had started with a floating clock tower island but
that was just a placeholder until I had a better
idea of what I wanted to be remembered by.
I eventually came up with a sort of simple 
double pyramid shaped floating droid (for lack
of a better description) and just went with that
to avoid over thinking.
